question:
[Kenneth] and his sister, [Joy] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Danielle] and her aunt, [Valerie], went to the deli. They got a half a pound of corned beef, and two pounds of salami. [Donald] took his sister, [Frances], to a baseball game. [Melissa] and [Kenneth] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together. [Harry] and his mother [Debra] were throwing a potluck with his sister, [Valerie]. [Debra]'s daughter, [Joy], showed up with a chocolate cake to share. [Dale] is out playing tennis with his daughter [Danielle] because it is nice and sunny outside. [Dale] has a daughter called [Danielle]. [Danielle], who is the sister of [Frances], is a lovely girl.
Question: How is [Melissa] related to [Donald]?
